properties.name: lolicon.size1200
properties.description: if true, use master_1200 thumb to reduce image size.

properties.name: lolicon.auto-delete-download-image
properties.description: if true, the used image will be deleted automatically.

properties.name: lolicon.confounding
properties.description: if true, the last of byte in picture is random.

properties.name: lolicon.reuse-image
properties.description: if true, when the quota is 0, used image will be return.
